creator: kinetik@flim.org

comments.text:
Intermittently but 1-2 times a day, audio stops working in Firefox when the audio output is a Logitech G930 (driver version 8.96.88, but possibly happened with other versions).  No clear regression range.  Audio works in other apps during this time, so seems to be specific to Firefox.  Replugging the headset (possibly also followed with a Firefox restart) resolves the issue.  Device in about:support appears as 8 channel/48kHz with preferred channel layout of "3f4 lfe".  No device enumeration differences between not working and working state (broken: https://www.dropbox.com/s/dpd3f2pboqgjxks/nosound.PNG?dl=0, working: https://www.dropbox.com/s/qmxd8u50nz3zyql/withsound.PNG?dl=0).

advcomp2019 reported this in #media on IRC, but it may be a more common issue with the G930 as similar behaviour was mentioned on Reddit in 2013 (https://www.reddit.com/r/pcgaming/comments/1qaqd5/psa_to_all_g930_headset_users/cdb4fyt/).
comments.author: kinetik@flim.org

comments.text:
Chromium bugs that may have clues:

- Possibly bad dwChannelLayout values from some devices - https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=169846#c55

- And https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=137043 which was fixed by https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=138762, which is probably just a lack of multichannel (>2) support and the fix, but may be worth comparing approaches.
comments.author: kinetik@flim.org

comments.text: Also with the G35 (very similar hardware, but wired USB headset rather than using a USB wireless transmitter): https://www.reddit.com/r/LogitechG/comments/42wyun/g35_youtubegames_do_not_have_sound_sometimes/ - note that post (and many other G930/G35 issues I found while searching) mention problems with other applications, there may be a driver/hardware level issue with these devices that's only triggered intermittently or under certain configurations... given they've been replaced by newer models, it may not be worth spending time on investigating.
comments.author: kinetik@flim.org

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

summary: Audio stops working with Logitech G930 requiring headset to be replugged
